title: Tomato Orecchiette with Brie and Basil
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and return to pot. Add remaining ingredients and stir to combine.
Note: Nutritional analysis is per 1 1/2-cup serving.
ingredients: 2 large tomatoes, chopped $Click to see savings
4 ounces brie cheese, sliced $Click to see savings
1 tablespoon minced garlic $Click to see savings
1/4 cup extra-virgin olive oil $Click to see savings
1 teaspoon kosher salt $Click to see savings
